Unfiltered: Result is taken from whatever texel the sample lies on, aka Point Sampling.
Linear: Linear blending is performed between a 2x2 (or 2x2x2) region of texels, aka Bilinear / Trilinear.
Blur1: A blur filter across a 3x3 (or 3x3x3) region of texels.
Blur2: A blur filter across a 5x5 (or 5x5x5) region of texels.
Blur3: A blur filter across a 7x7 (or 7x7x7) region of texels.
Blur4: A blur filter across a 9x9 (or 9x9x9) region of texels.
